com.hcl.domino.security

Interface Ecl


  • public interface Ecl
    Execution Control List (ECL) on server or client

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<ECLCapability> getCapabilities()
      Reads the current capabilities
      UserNamesList getNamesList()
      Returns the names list for which we compute the ECL
      boolean isEditable()
      Returns true if ECL can be modified by the user
      Set<ECLCapability> trustNoSignatureUser(DominoClient.ECLType type, Set<ECLCapability> capabilities, boolean sessionOnly)
      Method to modify the ECL for "-No signature-" and add trusted capabilities
      Set<ECLCapability> trustSignerOfDocument(Document doc, DominoClient.ECLType type, Set<ECLCapability> capabilities, boolean sessionOnly)
      Method to modify the ECL for the signer of the specified document and add trusted capabilities

    • Method Detail

      • getNamesList

        UserNamesList getNamesList()
        Returns the names list for which we compute the ECL
        Returns:
        names list

      • getCapabilities

        Set<ECLCapability> getCapabilities()
        Reads the current capabilities
        Returns:
        set of capabilities

      • isEditable

        boolean isEditable()
        Returns true if ECL can be modified by the user
        Returns:
        true if editable

      • trustNoSignatureUser

        Set<ECLCapability> trustNoSignatureUser(DominoClient.ECLType type,
                                        Set<ECLCapability> capabilities,
                                        boolean sessionOnly)
        Method to modify the ECL for "-No signature-" and add trusted capabilities
        Parameters:
        type - ECL type
        capabilities - capabilities to trust
        sessionOnly - true to not permanently change the ECL
        Returns:
        new capabilities

      • trustSignerOfDocument

        Set<ECLCapability> trustSignerOfDocument(Document doc,
                                         DominoClient.ECLType type,
                                         Set<ECLCapability> capabilities,
                                         boolean sessionOnly)
        Method to modify the ECL for the signer of the specified document and add trusted capabilities
        Parameters:
        doc - signed document (we read $Signature internally)
        type - ECL type
        capabilities - capabilities to trust
        sessionOnly - true to not permanently change the ECL
        Returns:
        new capabilities
